item.description:
New time! The movie is at 4:45 pm, Meet at 4:30 pm.

"Waltz with Bashir" an animated film about the film directors' attempt to remember his part in the 1982 Israeli-Lebanese War. I saw this at the 2009 Palm Springs International Film Festival in January. I highly recommend it. The animation is top notch, several points of camera view unusual in animated films. The Hartford Courant (actually Roger Moore of the Orlando News) gave it four stars. THe film also won Best Foreign Film award at the Golden Globes, a precursor to the Academy Awards.
item.how_to_find_us: I look my picture, but in a red winter coat.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "Waltz with Bashir" - an Israeli film
